milestones.name: backend_alive
milestones.message: Backend HTTP server accepting TCP connections - FastAPI process alive
milestones.detail: Uvicorn ASGI server responding to health checks (port auto-discovered)
milestones.label: Backend Init

milestones.name: database_init
milestones.message: Database connection pool established - Cloud SQL Proxy connecting to PostgreSQL
milestones.detail: SQLAlchemy engine initializing connection pool, authenticating with GCP Secret Manager credentials
milestones.label: Database Init

milestones.name: voice_init
milestones.message: Voice biometric system loading SpeechBrain ASR models into GPU memory
milestones.detail: Initializing Tacotron2 TTS, WaveGlow vocoder, and speaker verification embeddings (ResNet-based)
milestones.label: Voice Init

milestones.name: vision_init
milestones.message: Computer vision system loading YOLO v8 object detection models and PyTorch weights
milestones.detail: Initializing OpenCV camera capture interface, CUDA acceleration for real-time inference
milestones.label: Vision Init

milestones.name: voice_ready
milestones.message: Voice recognition system fully operational - SpeechBrain models loaded, embeddings cached
milestones.detail: Speaker verification ready: 256-dim embedding vectors, cosine similarity threshold 0.75, real-time inference < 100ms
milestones.label: Voice Ready

milestones.name: api_routes
milestones.message: API route registration complete - mounting WebSocket, REST, and voice endpoints to FastAPI router
milestones.label: API Routes

milestones.name: apis_ready
milestones.message: All API routes accepting requests - CORS enabled, authentication middleware active
milestones.detail: WebSocket server ready for bi-directional communication, REST endpoints serving JSON, voice streaming operational
milestones.label: APIs Ready

fallback_stages.message: Backend process spawned - waiting for HTTP server to bind
fallback_stages.label: Spawning

fallback_stages.message: Uvicorn server initializing - loading FastAPI application module and dependencies
fallback_stages.label: Module Load

fallback_stages.message: FastAPI app instance created - registering middleware (CORS, authentication, logging)
fallback_stages.label: Middleware

fallback_stages.message: Initializing core services - connecting to GCP Secret Manager for API keys
fallback_stages.label: Secrets Init

fallback_stages.message: Database connection pool initializing - establishing Cloud SQL Proxy tunnel
fallback_stages.label: DB Connect

fallback_stages.message: Loading AI/ML models - downloading SpeechBrain weights from HuggingFace (may take 30-60s first run)
fallback_stages.label: Model Download

fallback_stages.message: Voice models loading into memory - allocating GPU/CPU tensors for inference
fallback_stages.label: Voice Load

fallback_stages.message: Registering API routes - mounting endpoint handlers to FastAPI router
fallback_stages.label: Route Mount

fallback_stages.message: Starting background tasks - initializing async workers and event loops
fallback_stages.label: Workers Start

fallback_stages.message: Final health checks - verifying all systems operational before accepting connections
fallback_stages.label: Health Check
